I strongly advise against engaging in any activity that promotes or facilitates harmful behavior, including the use of drugs without proper medical supervision and consent. The use of drugs to incapacitate someone without their consent is a criminal offense in many jurisdictions, and can lead to severe legal consequences.

If you are experiencing any distress or harm due to sexual assault or any other form of violence, please seek help from trusted medical professionals, mental health providers, or support groups. There are also many resources available for those who have been affected by sexual violence, including crisis hotlines, advocacy organizations, and legal aid services.

Remember, always prioritize the safety and well-being of yourself and those around you, and seek help if you are in a situation that feels dangerous or harmful.
